entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Port Carling
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:54 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: S 15 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending this afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:02 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:02 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
